name: softwareVersion
displayName: Version of the software instance, usually following some convention like SemVer etc.

name: developmentStatus
displayName: Description of development status, e.g. work in progress (wip), active, inactive, suspended. See repostatus.org for more information.

name: codeRepository
displayName: Link to the repository where the un-compiled, human readable code and related code is located (SVN, GitHub, CodePlex, institutional GitLab instance, etc.).

name: programmingLanguage
displayName: The programming language(s) used to implement the software (e.g. Python, C++, Matlab, Fortran, Java, Julia,...)

name: operatingSystem
displayName: Operating systems supported (e.g. Windows 10, OSX 11.3, Android 11).

name: operatingSystemName
blockURI: Windows, Mac OS X, Linux, Android, ...

name: applicationCategory
displayName: Type of software application, e.g. Simulation, Analysis, Visualisation.

name: applicationSubCategory
displayName: Subcategory of the application, e.g. Arcade Game.

name: softwareHelp
displayName: Link to help texts or documentation

name: runtimePlatform
displayName: Runtime platform or script interpreter dependencies (Example - Java v1, Python2.3, .Net Framework 3.0). Supersedes runtime.

name: targetProduct
displayName: Target Operating System / Product to which the code applies. If applies to several versions, just the product name can be used.

name: softwareRequirementsName
displayName: Name or title of the required software/library

name: softwareSuggestions
displayName: Optional dependencies, e.g. for optional features, code development, etc.

name: softwareSuggestionsName
displayName: Name or title of the optional software/library

name: permissions
displayName: Permission(s) required to run the code (for example, a mobile app may require full internet access or may run only on wifi).

name: processorRequirements
displayName: Processor architecture required to run the application (e.g. IA64).

name: issueTracker
displayName: Link to software bug reporting or issue tracking system
